document.full_text: usain bolt has the potential to astound the world again after rewriting the men's 100 and 200 meters records over two epic seasons, four-times olympic sprint champion michael johnson said monday.
document.title: usain bolt can still get faster, says michael johnson
lines_and_colors: usain bolt has the potential to astound the world again after rewriting the men's 100 and 200 meters records over two epic seasons, four-times olympic sprint champion michael johnson said monday.
